MetricDescription: % systems compliant with separation of duties requirements
Target:
X % or higher, 
X % higher than previous period, 
X % increase over a defined period 

Higher is better, ideally 100%
Source: NIST (Archived): SP 800-55, Security Metrics Guide for Information Technology Systems

MetricDescription: % users with special access to systems who have undergone background evaluations
Target: % users with special access to systems who have undergone background evaluations
Source: NIST (Archived): SP 800-55, Security Metrics Guide for Information Technology Systems
